
### Colony Avatar using a base64 encoded URL

```jsx
const avatar = 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,';

const colony = {
  colonyName: 'NASA',
};
<ColonyAvatar
  address="0x1234567890987654321234567890987654321234"
  colony={colony}
  avatarURL={avatar}
/>
```

### Colony Avatar with Identicon as a fallback

```jsx
const colony = {
  colonyName: 'NASA',
};
<ColonyAvatar address="0x1234567890987654321234567890987654321234" colony={colony} />
```

### Colony Avatar with Link to the Colony's Route

```jsx
const colony = {
  colonyName: 'NASA',
};
<ColonyAvatar
  address="0x1234567890987654321234567890987654321234"
  colony={colony}
  showLink
/>
```
